casebody.data:
WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A., successor by merger to Wachovia Bank, N.A.
v.
Edna S. COLEMAN a/k/a Edna Coleman, et al. No. 92P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Kenneth B. Oettinger, Jr., Charlotte, for Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. (Merger to Wachovia Bank, N.A.). Lee Williams, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. (Merger to Wachovia Bank, N.A.). Joe E. Biesecker, Lexington, for Coleman, Edna S. Christopher Alan Raines, Lexington, for Coleman, Edna S. Baxter Chad Ewing, for Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. (Merger to Wachovia Bank, N.A.). Matthew A. Cherep, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, For Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. (Merger to Wachovia Bank, N.A.).

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of March 2015 by Defendant (Edna S. Coleman) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
